XIII.i.1.B
.1.c
.
Notifying Surviving Spouses in DIC Cases
When notifying a surviving spouse of entitlement to DIC,
include notice of eligibility for DEA in the corresponding decision notice, and
enclose with the notice
VA Form 21P-8765, Service-Connected Death Award Attachment
, and
VA Form 22-5490, Dependents’ Application for VA Education Benefits
.
Exception
:  Since an award of DIC under
38 U.S.C. 1151
does
not
establish eligibility for DEA, disregard the instructions in this block when DIC is awarded under this statute.
title: M21-1, Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B - Notification and Award Actions for Dependents' Educational Assistance (DEA)
citation: Part XIII, Subpart i, Chapter 1, Section B
